name: Orbyss-LowRez2022
description:
Be the last one standing! In Orbyss, you must use or avoid the Orb. 

Use powerups to aid in your survival, but be careful; The orb may charge you if the color matches your own!

Controls:

Spacebar- Start the game

R-Restart game

WASD-Move Red

Laft mouse Button- Use lasers/mines

Magnet- Repels-- or attracts the ball

Power "P"- Increases your blast radius

Mine "M"-Self explanatory. Only affects the Orb.

Speed-Up ">>" Running speed boost.

Stun Laser "L"- Also self explanatory. Works only on players. Stuns for a brief moment... unless you've been targeted!
